title: Nicki Minaj Down To Fight Designer Giuseppe Zanotti In Chris Brown-Soulja Boy Match
text:
1 
Nicki Minaj took to Twitter earlier today (February 3) to lash out at Giuseppe Zanotti, accusing the Italian shoe designer of â€œracismâ€ and â€œdisrespect.â€ 
Zanotti currently sells a line of sneakers called â€œNicki,â€ a collection that lists 23 designs that came about after the pair met and he supposedly told Minaj that she â€œinspired him to design a sneaker in [her] honor.â€ 
However, the rapper says that after reaching out to Zanottiâ€™s PR agency, she was informed that the famed designer wouldnâ€™t be returning her phone call. â€œLil black girl can inspire u but ainâ€™t worth a collection my nig,â€ Minaj tweeted in response. The rapper went on to joke about going toe-to-toe with Zanotti after the proposed fight between Chris Brown and Soulja Boy . 
â€œThis is wonderful. #GiuseppeZanotti seems to think itâ€™s ok to name his sneakers after me but his PR says they wonâ€™t take our call. Lol,â€ Nicki Minaj tweeted before continuing in subsequent posts. â€œI met #GiuseppeZanotti years ago. At which time, he told me I inspired him to design a sneaker in my honor. Wore them on the cover of Cosmo Recently when he gave other artists capsule collections, my agency reached out and was told theyâ€™re not taking our call. Just go on google, youâ€™ll see all the different pairs heâ€™s named after me. Lil black girl can inspire u but ainâ€™t worth a collection my nig? #RunMeMyCHECK #GiuseppeWhatsGood I got time today. barbz trend this cuz he gon learn today. The racism & disrespect wonâ€™t b tolerated. Take the poll. Should Giuseppe Donâ€™t care about the money. Itâ€™s just the disrespect. Youâ€™re not taking MY call? Lol. Give some money to charity in my name or smthn. U know what I gotta go. My phone ringing. Tell Floyd, Fif & Mike Tyson to book me for the next fight. Me and Giuseppe. after cb & Dracoâ€ This is wonderful. #GiuseppeZanotti seems to think it's ok to name his sneakers after me but his PR says they won't take our call. Lol.
